meanings.definition: A type of mountain range in Colorado.
meanings.sent1: The flatirons in Colorado are beautiful to see.
meanings.sent2: We hiked through the flatirons and enjoyed the stunning views.
meanings.sent3: I tried to climb one of the flatirons, but it was too steep!
meanings.sent4: The flatirons stood tall like ancient guardians of the land.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting behind the flatirons painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: A type of hair styling tool used to straighten hair.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses flatirons to make her hair smooth and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The hairstylist used flatirons to give me a sleek hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally touched the hot flatirons and burned my finger!
meanings.sent4: Her hair looked as straight as flatirons after using the styling tool.
meanings.sent5: The flatirons glided through her hair effortlessly, transforming it into a silky cascade.

meanings.definition: A type of geological formation characterized by steeply sloping rock layers.
meanings.sent1: The flatirons jutted out from the earth like giant stone blades.
meanings.sent2: We marveled at the unique shapes of the flatirons in the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The flatirons seemed to be playing hide and seek with the clouds above.
meanings.sent4: The flatirons loomed over the valley, casting long shadows at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The flatirons appeared as if nature had sculpted them with precision and care.
